text:
@RepTomRice I don’t see ur post announcing ur unsurprising diagnosis of being COVID-19 +. 

Hence forth, it should be known as the #TomRiceDeadlyVirus since so many in your family have it and you so irresponsibly passed it on to people with total disregard and abandonment. Screw you moron!
